mosinstall.name: Content
mosinstall.author: ARTIO s.r.o.
mosinstall.description: Adds SEO support for Content component.

param.name: ignoreSource
param.label: Ignore multiple sources:
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour of this option.

param.name: itemid
param.label: Itemid handling:
param.description: You can choose to override the default behaviour with your own Itemid.

param.name: overrideId
param.label: Override Itemid:
param.description: Itemid to always use with this component. Leave blank to use the default one.

param.name: titleid
param.label: Add content ID to URL:
param.description: If set to Yes, content ID will be prepended to content title in URL.

param.name: pagination
param.label: Handle pagination as non-SEF:
param.description: If set to Yes, limit and limitstart variables will be appended to URL as non-SEF.

param.name: guessId
param.label: Guess Itemid:
param.description: If set to Yes, the extension will try to guess the correct Itemid and replace the one given in URL.
